features.roleDescription: Facilitating trusted commercial transactions between Africa and the rest of the world.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Complete and personalized solutions for your international commercial needs

mediation.title: Commercial Mediation
mediation.description: We facilitate the resolution of commercial conflicts and alignment of interests between partners. Our neutral expertise enables us to find win-win solutions in complex negotiations.

negotiation.title: B2B Negotiation
negotiation.description: We represent your interests in international negotiations, draft robust commercial agreements and conduct strategic negotiations to maximize your opportunities.

sourcing.title: Partner Sourcing
sourcing.description: We identify and connect the ideal commercial partners for your projects. Our extensive network and expertise in African markets guarantee quality connections.

intelligence.title: Market Intelligence
intelligence.description: We analyze markets, identify emerging opportunities and provide strategic insights to guide your international commercial decisions.

support.title: International Support
support.description: We accompany you in all logistical, customs and regulatory aspects of your international operations to ensure smooth and compliant execution.

sectors.title: Our business sectors
sectors.subtitle: Specialized in exchanges between Africa and the world

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Our expertise at the service of your commercial projects

support.title: Personalized support

cta.title: Contact us today

presentationPage.subtitle: Discover our mission, values and approach to international commercial mediation
presentationPage.missionDescription: Medianeg International is a company specialized in commercial mediation and international negotiation, with a strategic focus on trade between Africa and the rest of the world. We facilitate trusted and efficient commercial transactions.
presentationPage.approachSubtitle: A proven methodology for sustainable results

analysis.title: In-depth analysis
analysis.description: We thoroughly analyze needs, markets and opportunities for each commercial project.

collaboration.title: Close collaboration
collaboration.description: We work in partnership with our clients to understand their specific objectives and challenges.

results.title: Measurable results
results.description: We focus on delivering concrete and measurable results for our partners.

actionPlanPage.mediatorTrainingDesc: Intensify our activities in agricultural products, raw materials and manufactured goods with strategic partners.

actionPlanPage.currentYearDescription: This year, we are focusing our efforts on strengthening our network of commercial partners, expanding our mediation services and improving our negotiation processes to offer even more effective solutions to our international clients.
